data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.0.3 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.1 PB 5
data.actual_result: You will get an error message (see attached image) and can't save the GIF.
data.expected_result: The GIF should be saved to the photos app.
data.short_description: Linked GIFs can't be saved to the photos app
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Desktop app and search for a GIF from giphy/tenor with the slash commands or send the link manually - Send this message with the link to the GIF - Now go back to the iOS app and open the GIF - Click again on this GIF in the image preview to open the buttons to interact with it - Click on the 3 dots and try to save the GIF to your photos app
